article.title: Northrop Grumman Receives Army Knowledge Online Modification
article.text: Northrop Grumman Information Systems, McLean, Va., was awarded a $25,220,493 modification (P00016) to contract W15QKN-13-F-0017 to exercise option year one for Army Knowledge Online Enterprise Services web-based enterprise information services. Fiscal 2014 operations and maintenance, Army funds in the amount of $10,473,522 were obligated at the time of the award. Army Contracting Command, Picatinny Arsenal, N.J., is the contracting activity.
